thing-type.label: LogReader
thing-type.description: Log reader to analyze log events

parameter.name: filePath
parameter.label: Log file path
parameter.description: Path to log file. Empty will default to ${OPENHAB_LOGDIR}/openhab.log

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh rate
parameter.description: Refresh rate in milliseconds for reading logs

parameter.name: errorPatterns
parameter.label: Error Patterns
parameter.description: Search patterns separated by | character for error events. Empty will default to ERROR+

parameter.name: errorBlacklistingPatterns
parameter.label: Error Blacklisting Patterns
parameter.description: Search patterns for blacklisting unwanted error events separated by | character.

parameter.name: warningPatterns
parameter.label: Warning Patterns
parameter.description: Search patterns separated by | character for warning events. Empty will default to WARN+

parameter.name: warningBlacklistingPatterns
parameter.label: Warning Blacklisting Patterns
parameter.description: Search patterns for blacklisting unwanted warning events separated by | character.

parameter.name: customPatterns
parameter.label: Custom Patterns
parameter.description: Search patterns separated by | character for custom events.

parameter.name: customBlacklistingPatterns
parameter.label: Custom Blacklisting Patterns
parameter.description: Search patterns for blacklisting unwanted custom events separated by | character.
